turkish_example_sentence: Sen o lezzetli yemeği yapsan, biz de severek yerdik.
english_example_sentence: If you were to make that delicious meal, we would also eat it with pleasure.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты приготовил это вкусное блюдо, мы бы тоже с удовольствием его съели.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen o lezzetli yemeği ______, biz de severek yerdik.
